amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to increasing United States exports and improving the competitiveness of United States businesses.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 724 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 724 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Kaine. (consideration: CR S1998; text: CR S1998) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to increasing United States exports and improving the competitiveness of United States businesses.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 724 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Kaine.
